frames.name: Frame
frames.toolTipDescription: Active frames of the hitbox/hurtbox. Click to jump to the first active frame.

part.name: Part
part.toolTipDescription: Determines if other hitboxes can hit an opponent

bone.name: Bone
bone.toolTipDescription: Bone of the model the Hitbox is attached to

x.name: X
x.toolTipDescription: X Position of the hitbox in relation to the center of the bone

y.name: Y
y.toolTipDescription: Y Position of the hitbox in relation to the center of the bone

z.name: Z
z.toolTipDescription: Z Position of the hitbox in relation to the center of the bone

x2.name: X2
x2.toolTipDescription: X Position for stretch coordinates on extended hitboxes

y2.name: Y2
y2.toolTipDescription: Y Position for stretch coordinates on extended hitboxes

z2.name: Z2
z2.toolTipDescription: Z Position for stretch coordinates on extended hitboxes

hitlag.name: Hitlag
hitlag.toolTipDescription: Determines how much the opponent is frozen in hitstun when hit by this move

sdi.name: SDI
sdi.toolTipDescription: How much each SDI input affects the victim's position

clang_rebound.name: Clang Rebound
clang_rebound.toolTipDescription: Indicates how the hitbox interacts with other hitboxes

facingrestrict.name: Facing Restrict
facingrestrict.toolTipDescription: Determines launch direction of the opponent

setweight.name: Set Weight
setweight.toolTipDescription: Determines if the opponent's weight should be used in Knockback calculation. When value is true, opponent's weight is always set to 100

rehit.name: Rehit
rehit.toolTipDescription: Determines if a hitbox can hit an opponent multiple times

reflectable.name: Reflectable
reflectable.toolTipDescription: Determines if a move can be reflected

absorbable.name: Absorbable
absorbable.toolTipDescription: Determines if the move can be absorbed

flinchless.name: Flinchless
flinchless.toolTipDescription: When true, this move will not deal damage animations or hitstun, but will still launch the opponent

disablehitlag.name: Disable Hitlag
disablehitlag.toolTipDescription: When true, hitlag will be set to 0 regardless of all other modifiers present

direct_hitbox.name: Direct Hitbox
direct_hitbox.toolTipDescription: Indicates if the move is not a projectile

ground_or_air.name: Ground/Air
ground_or_air.toolTipDescription: Determines if the hitbox affects grounded or aerial opponents

hitbits.name: Hitbits
hitbits.toolTipDescription: Determines what kinds of elements the move can interact with (characters, stages, items, etc)

collisionpart.name: Collision Part
collisionpart.toolTipDescription: Determines what kinds of character hurtboxes the move can interact with (head, body, legs, etc)

friendlyfire.name: Friendly Fire
friendlyfire.toolTipDescription: Determines if a move can hit teammates when friendly fire is disabled

sfxlevel.name: SFX Level
sfxlevel.toolTipDescription: Determines how loud the sound effect is

sfxtype.name: SFX Type
sfxtype.toolTipDescription: Determines which sound effect is used when the hitbox connects

type.name: Type
type.toolTipDescription: Type of hitbox, used for Spirit modifiers

more.name: Data
more.toolTipDescription: Shows all raw data for a hitbox
